title: NERF GLACIALS
body:
FOR THE LOVE OF EVERYTHING HOLY, NERF GLACIALS ALREADY!!!!

ITS SO FUN PLAYING AGAINST SOMEONE WITH GLACIALS WHO STUNS ALL YOUR CHAMPS FOR AGES AND YOU CANT DO ANYTHING ABOUT IT!!!

NERF. GLACIAL. CHAMPS.

replies.body:
Nononono. Don't nerf Glacial champs, nerf Glacial synergy (rework it actually).

The champs themselves are fine and some are even arguably grossly underpowered {{champion:127}} {{champion:106}} (Voli w/out Glacial is ass).

They need to rework how Glacial works (not just nerf it) then make Lissandra and Volibear viable outside Glacial comps.

Lissandra is valuable and often essential to ALL elementalists builds until you get anivia.
Voli gains health if he has an extra brawler buddy (often Warwick or Cho) and if itemized he is a viable tank hyper carry (there are youtube videos...)

Please link me a youtube video of Volibear w/out Glacial carrying.

And no, Lissandra is not "essential" to all elementalist builds. She's literally a token unit, that's it. She's not useful. You even said it yourself, you replace her with Anivia later because Anivia is actually useful and doesn't have absolute garbage tier scaling.

That's like saying Fiora is essential to all Noble and Blademaster builds.

ashe is the only one who proc glacial effectivly which make the synergy broken without the need of 4 or 6 glacial buffs 

and sej is pretty much in every good comp unless they run cho/gnar [in fact they tend to run 2 of the 3] or if they have the about to be fixed pyke spears stacking, sej only need 1 cast of her ulti anyway because it fucking freeze the whole team 90% of the time.

i rarely if ever see 4+ glac comps and when i do i either have to kill the ashe early or stop sej ulti somehow to win, 

if you nerf the synergy all you do is just harm the 4 victims {{champion:106}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:201}}  while ashe/sej will stay top tier because ashe massive attack speed boost from ranger will hard proc glac even at 5% and sej ulti is broken no matter what comp you run.

They need to just reduce how often it procs and effect sizes for SOME glacial champs:

1.  Reduce overall proc capabilities for Ashe (don't let hurricane proc or reduce its chances)

2.  Reduce the size of Sej ult AOE.  Almost a whole map freeze that lasts way too long.

3.  Fix whatever bug it is when a champ gets frozen for over 5 seconds from 1 shot.  I have had it multiple times.  If it is intentional, then it is absolute nuts.

Hurricane shots do NOT make procs happen.
Sej has a fat mana bar, zephyr counters her, demons counter her, killing her quickly counters her.
You have been frozen for a long time probably due to the way Ashe's ult works, the longer the distance traveled, the longer the stun.
spreading the fuck out also helps counter sej. and counter most of the glacial team.
3 is because Ashe arrow has 1 extra second of stun time per hex it crosses......lol it feels like an eternity at max range yet Leonas ability hardly feels like it does that much cc time.

Voli and Lissandra are both compatible with other Comps.

Bruisers+Guardians for Voli. He gets atleast a 2peice Glacial out of it as well.
Elementals+Whatever for Lissandra.

Yordles are indeed annoying, but they at least can be addressed currently with rapid fire cannon (prevents attacks from being dodged) and would only need their numbers tweaked along with item drops having a more even chance or occuring.

Same can be said of Pyke and Lulu spell spam and how Demon teams and Kassadin can counter them somewhat.

Glacial however just seems poorly thought out and never feels fair. Three Glacial Champs have stuns as spells (Ashe, Lissandra, and Sejuani), so giving them the equivalent of Udyr E without any timing restriction is just asking for stun lock shenanigans.

Given the prevalence of guinsoos in this mode, I would actually suggest allowing glacial comps to lower or even reset attack speed would be better.
nobles too

Should have a per unit on-effect cooldown.

Like if the glacial effect has been proc'd on an enemy unit, that enemy unit can't receive the effect again for 5 / 4 / 3 seconds or something like that. 

It's so dumb losing the usual 45% stun rate and having been stunned out of a chance to fight back for the last 20 seconds of the round.
Here's an idea, replace glacial stun with slow, maybe both movement and atk spd slow. It can scale from 15% per 2 glacials up to 45%.
they need to rework how glacials work because i would like to play the game but none of my champs can play the game because their frozen all the time :)

there should be a bonus giving immunity against status effects.
time for a new class maybe?

Please get rework glacials the stupid stun feels horrible to play against.  I got knocked out into 5th place because my front line was quite literally frozen in place the entire time until they died. At the least make more of them level 4 (Ashe for example). Fighting against 4 or more glacials especially when you can turn another ranger besides Ashe into a glacial is such a terrible experience and I can see ruining ranked.
Glacial is so unfun to play against, I've suggested instead of a 2 second stun, put on a 30-50% slow of attack and move speed.

To be honest I think glacial is fine. Yes they are very strong and annoying to play against in lategame, but considering that it's really hard to get a glacial comp started, as they have 0 one-cost units and the 2 2-cost units are quite terrible (lissandra/braum) Also the glacial synergy has rather weak early game effect when compared how insanely hard wild or noble buff can carry you early.

I've played a lot of glacial and I think they are fine.
My favorite thing in the world is going against a Yordle team when I have a pair of 2-star Varus on the field.  Hilarious.
try spreading out.

Ashe becomes a god of stun if you spread out and Sej becomes the god of stun when you are packed there isn't really a great answer for it except to immediately kill them before they can get going or have a Sol/MF to ult in the corner against them or one case I had Swain in immediate frontline to ult with Morello's and hopefully not get frozen before he casts it.

spreading out doesnt really change ashe. if you're all in one corner, or spread across different corners, its not really different. she's picking one person. yes the distance increases the stun, but thats not changing you put everyone together or not. its doesnt really make her do anything different. it DOES help against sej, AND voli, AND lissandra though.

actually it does make a major difference against Ashe because she always aims for the farthest target and it can be blocked if units are standing in the way which happens naturally when clumped and one guy moving away when spread apart guarantees that Ashe arrow stuns for like 10 seconds on someone that's in the back which is normally the important dps/ability.

i dont think its 10 seconds and you're blowing it way out of proportion. additionally, you should have a front line of some kind, and that will highly likely intercept the shot (if it even works that way. news to me that it does.) and regardless, the benefits to your team's survival greatly outweigh the negatives in regards to ashe.
They should just make an item that makes you stun immune

The best rework I can think of for Glacials would be AS slow. Basically a Frozen Heart like ability. Say for every 2/4/6 Glacials, attacks will slow enemies attack speed by 10/15/20% for 2 seconds, non stacking of course.

The thing with glacials is that they are so common that getting 2 or even 4 of them is ridiculously easy.

Meanwhile, other team compositions require  2 super rare champions…
